metadata.title: CVE-2020-8813 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
graph_realtime.php in Cacti 1.2.8 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary OS commands via shell metacharacters in a cookie, if a guest userhas the graph real-time privilege.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds2-1ubuntu1').
